General.Name: Uno&Company.Ltd
General.Description: POLARIS UNO, Inc. produces and sells synthetic fibers, electronic materials, and optical products for wigs in South Korea. It offers PVC wig fibers under the Falang brand name; braid fibers under Acra brand; and high temperature and flame retardant fibers under UNOLON brand name, as well as wig oils and glues. The company also offers copper clad laminates for printed circuit boards to produce electronic products; electronic materials, such as adhesives for copper foils, releasing agents, and flame retardants; optical monomers for plastic lens; and adhesive labels. The company was formerly known as UNO&COMPANY.,LTD. and changed its name to POLARIS UNO, Inc. in March 2022. POLARIS UNO, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is based in Wanju-gun, South Korea.
